name: The Prisoner's Dilemma (Brandon Kedson, pineappleguy3)
description:
In this innovative platformer, help a prisoner escape from jail while he's still in shackles. Knock out guards, solve puzzles,  and find your way to the exit - all the while connected to a ball and chain that won't let you go.

Submission for GMTK Game Jam 2021

Controls:

  • A/D or left/right - Movement
  • W or up - Jump
  • Space - Pick up your ball and chain or put it down again
  • R - Restart the level
